Sentencas: Improvement of anode characteristics of solid oxide fuel cells is important for the better cell performance and especially the direct use of hydrocarbons.
Titulo: Large-scale calculations of solid oxide fuel cell cermet anode by tight-binding quantum chemistry method

Sentencas: A mixture of ceramics and metal is generally used as anode, and different combinations of ceramics and metals lead to different electrode characteristics.
Titulo: Large-scale calculations of solid oxide fuel cell cermet anode by tight-binding quantum chemistry method

Sentencas: We performed large-scale calculations to investigate the characteristics of Ni/CeO2 and Cu/CeO2 anodes at the electronic level using our tight-binding quantum chemical molecular dynamics program.
Titulo: Large-scale calculations of solid oxide fuel cell cermet anode by tight-binding quantum chemistry method

Sentencas: Charge distribution analysis clarified the electron transfer from metal to oxide in both anodes.
Titulo: Large-scale calculations of solid oxide fuel cell cermet anode by tight-binding quantum chemistry method

Sentencas: The calculations of density of states clarified different contributions of Ni and Cu orbitals to the energy levels at around Fermi level in each cermet.
Titulo: Large-scale calculations of solid oxide fuel cell cermet anode by tight-binding quantum chemistry method

Sentencas: Based on the obtained results, we made considerations to explain different characteristics of both cermet anodes.
Titulo: Large-scale calculations of solid oxide fuel cell cermet anode by tight-binding quantum chemistry method

Sentencas: The effectiveness of our approach for the investigation of complex cermet system was proved.
Titulo: Large-scale calculations of solid oxide fuel cell cermet anode by tight-binding quantum chemistry method
